topic.title: white paper
topic.body:
i just read the white paper of https://ipfs.io/. I usually skip them but this one was easy and fun to read.

Some recommendations for other interesting and fun to read papers?

topic.title: torrent download and automatic IPFS pin
topic.body:
i want to download a torrent by magnet link and automatically pin it in IPFS

which linux terminal client is able to query for the torrent hash move the torrent to a subfolder with that hash?

pending torrents are located in:
torrent_download_folder/torrent

when they are completed i want to move them to:
archive/<torrent_hash>/torrent

then i will run the ipfs add -r archive/<torrent_hash>

is there a torrent client which can run a script after completed download and query for the torrent_hash?

2_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp.body:
same here but to add. my sim is free and has little Internet 100mb and free calls to family :) was a promotion.

how about your rent though?

12_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body:
Not Found

could you share the plain address?

13_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body:
Not Found

could you share the plain address?
If you need help i will help you.

10_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body: why should they? keep it simple, stupid. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KISS_principle

14_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body: it is cool, sad i figured how to use the databases already haha.

If i start a site from scratch sure. at the moment i just copy paste parts i need. takes only 15 seconds max.

will you add documentation of all fields on the fly?

2_15jbvtNJw2ih3m5L38mUcdJxtvmW6Uh2K6.body:
> [godfather1434](#comment_6_15jbvtNJw2ih3m5L38mUcdJxtvmW6Uh2K6): @Kopyjane.. You are the master.. Just wanted this for my site.. :) Thats why was trying.. I will use both your site and mine to upload the video that way we get more seeders ..  I would like to work with you on this.. Anything that I can do.. How can I reach you..

are you sure about this? as i can remember there were seeders only per site. that means your and copykatesss would not share seeders. anybody have hard facts on this one?

> [kaffie](#comment_526_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): This is wrong. KopyKate uses webtorrent, so the torrents themselves can be seeded by anyone; whether it's through a zeronet site, through a torrent app, a clearnet site, etc.

thanks for clearing this up

1_1BghwqwD4SJaigm7kQjxvgTyEdxZgzWhSS.body:
what do you use Zeronet for?
what do you use Clearweb for?

if those two are the same i will promote it.

so far all people i told about it and were not nerds or devs did not stick around long.

it is great concept and also great tech so far. i was hooked from the first second i loaded it up.

i work on improving my experience on it so are others. the masses will follow when it is convenient.

2_1M7mNWkk2eJQqeWw5KexXWHo565mmnXCU9.body:

don't worry about it it is fine :)

5_17H8EGEoNF1z2AXFtXmBQJLHTmh7gMGzzS.body:
> [realkittykate](#comment_39_17H8EGEoNF1z2AXFtXmBQJLHTmh7gMGzzS): I've just looked that up, actually. I just feel it would be too much of a pain doing all that command line, especially when ZeroNet gets really, really big.

you are right. long term i wish we could offload big files :)

i can seed 1,5TB on my second drive but only 30GB on my main drive.

1509336621_17H8EGEoNF1z2AXFtXmBQJLHTmh7g.body: in some countries there is no copyright or at least not enforced. in Thailand if you just torrent nobody cares.

1511662798_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body:
all people i know slip into downs. the difference is how frequent they get up. (i like to have a reason to be down, i love the high when i feel good again)

it does not matter the circumstances usually.

my personal experience is find people who are not affected by the reasons you are down and you are not affected by theirs.
